trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [prime numbers v] to [ ] set [number v] to [2] ask [I'll generate the prime numbers up to this number:] and wait set [upper range v] to (answer) repeat ((upper range) - (1)) set [is prime v] to [true] set [index v] to [2] repeat until <<(index) = (number)> or <(is prime) = [false]>> if <((number) mod (index)) = [0]> then set [is prime v] to [false] end change [index v] by (1) end if <(is prime) = [true]> then set [prime numbers v] to (join (prime numbers) (join (number) [, ])) end change [number v] by (1) end say (prime numbers)
